effect_size: Large protective effect (Cohen's d = 1.18 for radiographic stability)
participants: 318 RA patients using CBD long-term (≥12 months)
notes: Cannabidiol and Disease-Modifying Effects in Rheumatoid Arthritis: Longitudinal Study
abstract: CBD users: Mean Sharp score increase 1.2 units vs historical controls: 4.8 units (75% less progression); sustained low disease activity in 69%
